name.ja: <ruby>髑<rt>どく</rt></ruby><ruby>巌<rt>がん</rt></ruby><ruby>襲<rt>しゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>来<rt>らい</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: There are 3 or more monsters on the field.

effect.en: Destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field. Then, you can Fusion Summon a Zombie Type monster with 0 DEF by shuffling Zombie Type monsters from your field or Graveyard into the owner's Deck as material.
